comments.body: Hi @dharhas, I am pretty sure the Apache 2 license, requires the `license_file` entry. If the license isn't in the pypi tarball, you can package it manually in the recipe: http://conda-forge.github.io/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually
thanks for the link. the Licence wasn't in the pypi tarball. I'll package it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@  home: https://ponyorm.com
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  summary: 'Pony is a Python Object Relational Mapper (ORM) with beautiful query syntax.'
